sections.heading: Creating a new account (Register)
body: To use Flovers, you need to create a personal user account. Registration is performed directly in the mobile application.
During registration, only an e-mail address and a password are required. No additional personal details are requested at this stage.
The password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one number and one special character to ensure basic security.
Before completing registration, you must accept the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy.

sections.heading: Account activation by e-mail
body: After submitting the registration form, an activation e-mail is sent to the provided e-mail address.
To activate your account, you must click the confirmation link contained in the e-mail.
Until the account is activated, logging in to the application is not possible.

sections.heading: Resending the activation e-mail
body: If you did not receive the activation e-mail, you can request it to be resent from within the application.
This option is available on the login or registration screen and can be used if the original message was lost, delayed, or filtered as spam.
Always make sure to check your spam or junk mail folder before requesting another activation message.

sections.heading: Logging in to an existing account
body: To log in, you only need the e-mail address and password associated with your account.
If your account has not yet been activated, the application will prompt you to confirm your e-mail address first.
Login credentials are verified securely on the backend; passwords are never stored in plain text.

sections.heading: Resetting a forgotten password
body: If you are unable to log in because you forgot your password, you can request a password reset e-mail.
The reset e-mail contains instructions and a secure link that allows you to set a new password.
After setting a new password, you can immediately log in using the updated credentials.

sections.heading: Security notes
body: Each user account is protected by a unique password chosen during registration.
For security reasons, you should not share your login credentials with other people.
If you suspect unauthorized access to your account, change your password as soon as possible.
